Source.Name: navi
Source.Summary: An interactive cheatsheet tool for the command-line
Source.Description: navi allows you to browse through cheatsheets (that you may write yourself or download from maintainers) and execute commands. Suggested values for arguments are dynamically displayed in a list.

Package.Name: navi
Package.Summary: An interactive cheatsheet tool for the command-line
Package.Description: navi allows you to browse through cheatsheets (that you may write yourself or download from maintainers) and execute commands. Suggested values for arguments are dynamically displayed in a list.
